amendment.description: To except the application of certain rescissions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1273, under the order of 3/14/2025, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 129.

action.text: Amendment SA 1273 proposed by Senator Merkley.
